results.content: I needed a safe way to handle my API keys in front-end projects, and I got what I was looking for. I was slightly disappointed because course used a fake smtp service for the email example, but as far as the serverless functionality goes, everything was good, and easy to understand.

results.content: As always great course by john

I signed up for this course to have a little further insight to what 'serverless functions' are, what the fuss is all about,  why I should even care and how I can use these to make my life easier and of course, enabling me to pass myself off as being someone up to date with all of the latest and greatest tech in the dev world. It so turns out that the fuss was not unsubstantiated. There is indeed good reason to use this and John, the instructor, puts forward   good, well formatted examples on why and how. That's all I was looking for. Job done, boxes ticked. Thank you.
